Package com.example.eventscan.Database

Class Database

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventscan.Database.Database
Direct Known Subclasses:
DatabaseTest, TestDatabase
public class Database extends Object
Helper class for easily pulling/pushing data from/to the database call the getter functions as early as possible, use foo.getResult() to resolve them, do this as late as possible
